name: Kahvihub
tagline: Multi-build Java project implementation of the IoT Hub
body:

-------

**Julien Mineraud**
+ http://www.cs.helsinki.fi/u/mineraud/

Known issues
------------

* At the moment, the default JVM version should be 1.7
